content: Hi everyonewith this method can you buy a prepaid Visa card with bitcoin and spend them in anywhere, which is perfect!Note: the visa isn't redeemable in Albania; Belarus; Congo; the Democratic Republic of the Congo; Cote d'Ivoire; Cuba; Islamic Republic of Iran; Iraq; Democratic People's Republic of Korea; Republic of Korea; Lebanon; Libya; Myanmar; Nicaragua; Pakistan; Somalia; South Sudan; Sudan; Syrian Arab Republic; Turkey; Ukraine; Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela; Yemen; Zimbabwe.https://i.imgur.com/ks6sxCG.pnghttps://i.imgur.com/NoesEAR.pnghttps://i.imgur.com/GHROyix.pngI can accept for this method, cryptocurrencies, binance, Skrill, Perfect money, advcash and escrow on bitifyMethod price: $10Fast contactTelegram: https://t.me/edphonesor WhatsApp: https://wa.me/+15633070017

comments.author: StuffSneak
comments.body: Purchased this a couple of days ago. OP is providing a website link where you can purchase preloaded VCCs with minimum balance of 10$. So that is the minimum you HAVE to spend to even to generate a single VCC & that 10$ is not refundable. Who in right mind would use this for Trials etc. by spending minimum 10$ each time? Moreover, the site looks so untrustworthy, it looks like a WordPress site with few woo commerce products something created within 2 days.OP tried giving me another option, a new website which is genuine but then again, it needs KYC & the minimum spend per VCC again comes as 8-10$.Very useless purchase for me in my opinion. There are multiple sites which I know personally where I can create 5$ per vcc & those sites come up with just a Google Search.Only purchase if you specifically need above types of VCCs. Otherwise avoid.
